item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 17, 2024 at 1:55 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Nyxpsi – A Next-Gen Network Protocol for Extreme Packet Loss (68 points | 22 comments)
2. Chain of Thought Empowers Transformers to Solve Inherently Serial Problems (23 points | 1 comment)
3. FreeBSD 13.4-Release Announcement (18 points | 5 comments)
4. K340A: The Brain Computer of Chernobyl Duga Radar [video] (98 points | 20 comments)
5. Launch HN: Silurian (YC S24) – Simulate the Earth (255 points | 125 comments)
6. Amazon tells employees to return to office five days a week (813 points | 969 comments)
7. Franzelio: Draw Lines. Make Music. Share Your Instrument (25 points | 11 comments)
8. Intel foundry business to make custom chip for Amazon, chipmaker's shares jump (55 points | 21 comments)
9. A Spreadsheet and a Debugger Walk into a Shell (128 points | 5 comments)
10. Mecanum Wheel (21 points | 5 comments)
11. Y Combinator is predicated on startups that require low capitalization (31 points | 10 comments)
12. Intel lost the Sony Playstation business to AMD (149 points | 89 comments)
13. Dissecting the gzip format (8 points | 2 comments)
14. Datomic and Content Addressable Techniques (121 points | 30 comments)

16. Apple Watch sleep apnea detection gets FDA approval (326 points | 239 comments)
17. Finetune, Eval, Deploy 60 LLMs in a single Colab notebook (8 points | discuss)
18. Omnipresent AI cameras will ensure good behavior, says Larry Ellison (18 points | 10 comments)
19. The Pragmatic Programmer for Machine Learning (87 points | 6 comments)
20. D&D is Anti-Medieval (266 points | 350 comments)
21. Fair: A Go library for serving resources fairly (178 points | 36 comments)
22. S6 – skarnet's small supervision suite (71 points | 24 comments)
23. Open Source Form Back End (4 points | discuss)
24. How to succeed in MrBeast production (Leaked PDF) (1914 points | 1215 comments)
25. Fractran: Computer architecture based on the multiplication of fractions (84 points | 17 comments)
26. Show HN: Sisi – Semantic Image Search CLI tool, locally without third party APIs (104 points | 38 comments)
27. Show HN: JAQT – JavaScript Queries and Transformations (85 points | 26 comments)
28. macOS Sequoia is available today (328 points | 429 comments)
29. Ask HN: Does anyone use sound effects in their dev environment? (179 points | 253 comments)
30. Ask HN: What runs L4-related microkernels/hypervisors these days? (75 points | 40 comments)
